ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Ok..new bard here.
ygData.msgSnippet: It is a bard tactic known as twisting, and I have heard a good bard can twist 3 songs at once. I am no master on bards though - check out The Concert Hall
ygData.messageBody:
<P> It is a bard tactic known as twisting, and I have
heard a good bard can twist 3 songs at once. I am no
master on bards though - check out The Concert Hall
at</P>
<P><A
href="http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/index.html">http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/index.html</A></P>
<P><BR> </P>
<P>  <B><I>stonemn@...</I></B> wrote:
<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT:
5px; BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid"><TT>I just made a
bard on Tallos Zek (And I don't have to tell you how
frickin<BR>difficult it is to get out the main gate
without getting attacked) and I've<BR>heard that you
can play more than one song at a time.  Is this a
system bug<BR>or something that bards can actually
do?<BR><BR></TT><BR><!-- |**|begin egp html banner|**|
